tool.name: Create Cluster Map
tool.description: Takes the output of a clutering cdhit or uclust and potential names files from dereplication to produce a cluster mapping file in either mothur or qiime format.
tool.help:
**Description**
Generates OTU mapping file in either QIIME or Mothur format
Takes the output of a clutering program (cdhit-est, uclust) and potential names files from dereplication to create a file which creates a OTU or cluster mapping file in either mothur or qiime format.
.. class:: infomark
At least one of the flags must be specified select at least one of: qiimeotu, namesotu, countotu.
